about.title: About us
about.content: Résidence Des Oliviers is a Medical-Social Establishment Dedicated to Supporting the Elderly. Our Mission is to Provide a Safe, Comfortable, and Humane Living Environment, where each Resident is Welcomed with Respect and Dignity. We Combine Quality Care with a Personalized Approach, Attentive to the Physical, Psychological, and Social Needs of each Individual.

training.title: Training
training.content: Résidence Des Oliviers Encourages and Supports Continuous Training and the Professional Development of its Staff. The Diversity of Professions and Generations within our Facility Drives the Continuous Training Program.
